The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 04 November is 6,223 (720.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 30 October, there were 823 new confirmed cases (95.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 October, there were 660 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 25% ( 163 extra cases).
